To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private CommodityChannelIndex _cci;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_cci = CCI(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_cci.IsReady)
{
    var typicalPriceAverage = _cci.TypicalPriceAverage.Current.Value;
    var typicalPriceMeanDeviation = _cci.TypicalPriceMeanDeviation.Current.Value;
    var current = _cci.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.cci = self.CCI(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.cci.IsReady:
    typical_price_average = self.cci.TypicalPriceAverage.Current.Value
    typical_price_mean_deviation = self.cci.TypicalPriceMeanDeviation.Current.Value
    current = self.cci.Current.Value
